text:
complex's

September 16, 2017

John Legend Is Already Getting Roasted by His Daughter Thanks to Chrissy

John Legend's baby girl Luna is already roasting her dad for his bad eyesight. Legend gave insight into his family dynamic while on tour.
title: John Legend Is Already Getting Roasted by His Daughter Thanks to Chrissy
